Uses of Interface
org.gephi.filters.api.Query

  • Packages that use Query 
    Package Description
    org.gephi.filters.api
    API for graph filtering.

    • Uses of Query in org.gephi.filters.api

      Methods in org.gephi.filters.api that return Query 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Query FilterController.createQuery​(Filter filter)
      Creates a query from filter.
      Query FilterController.createQuery​(FilterBuilder builder)
      Creates a query from builder.
      Query[] Query.getChildren()
      Returns queries that are children of this query.
      Query FilterModel.getCurrentQuery()
      Returns the query currently active or null if none is active.
      Query[] Query.getDescendantsAndSelf()
      Utility method that returns all descendant queries plus this query.
      Query Query.getParent()
      Returns the parent query or null if this query is root.
      Query[] FilterModel.getQueries()
      Returns all queries in the model, represented by their root query.
      Query[] Query.getQueries​(Class<? extends Filter> filterClass)
      Utility method that returns all queries in this query hierarchy that are filterClass instance.
      Methods in org.gephi.filters.api with parameters of type Query 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void FilterController.add​(Query query)
      Adds query as a new query in the system.
      void FilterLibrary.deleteQuery​(Query query)
      Delete a saved query from the library.
      void FilterController.exportToColumn​(String title, Query query)
      Exports query result in a new column title.
      void FilterController.exportToLabelVisible​(Query query)
      Exports query result to visible/hidden labels.
      void FilterController.exportToNewWorkspace​(Query query)
      Exports query result in a new workspace.
      GraphView FilterController.filter​(Query query)
      Filtering method for API users.
      void FilterController.filterVisible​(Query query)
      Filters main graph with query and set result as the new visible graph.
      void FilterController.remove​(Query query)
      Removes query from the system if exists.
      void FilterController.removeSubQuery​(Query query, Query parent)
      Removes query from parent query.
      void FilterController.rename​(Query query, String name)
      Renames query with name.
      void FilterLibrary.saveQuery​(Query query)
      Save query in the library in order it can be reused.
      void FilterController.selectVisible​(Query query)
      Selects query results on the main graph visualization window.
      void FilterController.setCurrentQuery​(Query query)  
      void FilterController.setSubQuery​(Query query, Query subQuery)
      Sets subQuery as a child of query.
